titleStmt.title: In eiusdem Aeliani Hystoriam Graecè, Latiné, & Anglicé conscriptam: T. S. Cantabr.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: In eiusdem Aeliani Hystoriam Graecè, Latiné, & Anglicé conscriptam: T. S. Cantabr.

monogr.title: A registre of hystories : conteining martiall exploites of worthy warriours, politique practises of ciuil magistrates, wise sentences of famous philosophers, and other matters manifolde and memorable. Written in Greeke, by Ælianus a Romane: and deliuered in Englishe (as well, according to the truth of the Greeke text, as of the Latine) by Abraham Fleming. Seene and allowed
monogr.author: Aelian

div.head: In eiusdem Aeliani Hystoriam Graecè, Latiné, & Anglicé conscriptam: T. S. Cantabr.
div.l: Cùr animo in studijs contingit nauseà nulla?
Ergò tuos minimè miror, ROMANE, labores,
Dum Romam Graecè 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 .
Nec, GERMANE, tuos dum pandis Graeca Latinis,
Nec noua depingit penna, BRITANNE, tua.
Dicere sed cogor veré: 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉
